reviewText: 50 year old movies or possibly older that were re recorded to DVD from maybe an 8 millimeter very poor quality very grainy hard to watch I watched about 20 min of Joseph and his brothren and the acting was bad the movie was so poorly recorded I could not watch and more I did not watch and of the other movies .They should be a law against people selling this poor quality re recording I am sorry that I bought this trash  this was not worth even $.01
Story lines a bit off of Scripture on some. Have to like the old way they did movies decades ago and black and white on some of the movies. For the most part-good.

This collection of eight religious-themed movies includes THE TEN COMMANDMENTS, HILL NUMBER ONE, I BEHELD HIS GLORY, MARTIN LUTHER, JOSEPH AND HIS BRETHREN, THE POWER OF RESURRECTION, DAVID AND GOLIATH, and THE GREAT COMMANDMENT. Older footage with some big name stars. A lot of content for the price!
THE MOVIES WERE HORRIBLE, YOU COULD HARDLY HEAR WHAT THEY WERE SAYING AND THEY SEEM LIKE THAY WERE FILMED WITH A CAMCORDER IN THE 70'S.
I thought this was a worthwhile collection of Bible films. Would recommend it.
my kids don't like it at all
The bible was not my expectations the picture itself was not clear I was very much dissatisfied
